heroSubtitle: The smartest platform for your service needs.
introText: Shamil App is a smart platform connecting users with service providers. Book appointments, manage schedules, and handle payments securely, all in one place.
forUsersBenefit1: Easy Booking: Find and book services in seconds.
forUsersBenefit2: Secure Payments: Pay instantly and securely.
forUsersBenefit3: Manage Bookings: Keep track of your appointments.
forUsersBenefit4: Discover Nearby: Find services near your location.
forProvidersBenefit2: Client Management: Keep track of your customers.
forProvidersBenefit3: Payment Tracking: Monitor revenue and payments.
forProvidersBenefit4: Grow Your Base: Reach more potential customers.
step2Desc: Choose a time and book instantly.
step3Desc: Manage your booking and enjoy the service.
getShamilAppSubtitle: Experience seamless service booking and management at your fingertips.
testimonial1Text: "Shamil App made booking my gym sessions incredibly easy!"
getStartedWithShamil: Get started with the smartest way to manage services.
testimonial1Text: "Shamil App is a game-changer! The service booking is incredibly smooth, and the interface is super easy to use, even for beginners. Definitely a must-try!"
testimonial2Text: "I'm impressed with how detailed and reliable the provider dashboard is. Shamil App does most of the work, making client management effortless. Fantastic tool!"
testimonial3Text: "I've tried multiple booking platforms, but Shamil App takes it to the next level. The speed, clarity, and payment system are unmatched. Perfect for our studio!"
previewSectionSubtitle: The best app for all your service needs! 100s of services divided by category. Book, manage, and pay with ease.
